channel.title: Posts on fawx
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on fawx

item.title: Hi, Kiddo.
item.description: I’m not sure when you’ll receive this. Time machines, even the ones that only travel forward, are tricky to aim.

item.title: An Ode to Set Intersection
item.description: This here is Norman Casagrande, last.fm’s former head researcher and my former mentor. The facial expression seen here is one of my favorites. It’s usually accompanied by some questionably-translated Italian aphorism, ”You know, Erik, that is like the ox saying ‘horned’ to the donkey.”

item.title: Kiev
item.description:
“Haven’t you ever wondered why the Church doesn’t allow women to be preachers?”

“Not specifically,” I replied, throwing my pack on the bed. I sat down. Icelandic Pizza Chef sat down on the opposite bed.

“It makes God less attractive to women, so they all become whores and drug addicts.“

item.title: Ulaan Baatar
item.description:
Hi Mom!

Remember when I called you from the post office in Ulaan Baatar? The conversation was short, and I probably sounded distracted. Here’s why:

item.title: Naushki
item.description: It’s easier to handle the vastness of the Gobi desert if one approaches it through Siberia. The brainstuff is already properly tenderized, prepared to handle the gradient of bleak to bleaker.

item.title: Khuzhir
item.description: Khuzhir is the only town on Olkhon, which is the only island on Lake Baikal, which is the only lake in the world that has no lakes older than it.
